creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Symmetrical composition featuring a large central object that simulates the shape of a light bulb; in its center, a ray-like projection extends from its base to its top; the words "OCULUS FOCUS" inscribed LC (within the image); predominant colors: black, brown, grey, yellow
